      • getLibraryChooserImportHandler

        @NonNull
public static LibraryChooser.LibraryImportHandler getLibraryChooserImportHandler(@NonNull
                                                                                          ReferenceHelper refHelper)
        Returns library import handler which imports global library to sharable one. See LibraryChooser.showDialog(org.netbeans.api.project.libraries.LibraryManager, org.netbeans.api.project.libraries.LibraryChooser.Filter, org.netbeans.api.project.libraries.LibraryChooser.LibraryImportHandler) for usage of this handler.
        Parameters:
        refHelper - the ReferenceHelper
        Returns:
        copy handler
        Since:
        1.62

      • getLibraryChooserImportHandler

        @NonNull
public static LibraryChooser.LibraryImportHandler getLibraryChooserImportHandler(@NonNull
                                                                                          File librariesLocation)
        Returns library import handler which imports global library to sharable one. See LibraryChooser.showDialog(org.netbeans.api.project.libraries.LibraryManager, org.netbeans.api.project.libraries.LibraryChooser.Filter, org.netbeans.api.project.libraries.LibraryChooser.LibraryImportHandler) for usage of this handler.
        Parameters:
        librariesLocation - the location of the libraries definition file to import the library into
        Returns:
        copy handler
        Since:
        1.62
